I need to compare two object graphs for my JUnit test.

Example: A -> B -> =
C

Each class has a couple of attributes.

A contains B which contains C.

=
I have two instances of A: a1 and a2.

I test all the attributes of the a1 =
object graph in my test after 
the method under test has returned it to me.=
 Then I change a 
parameter and call that method again and get the instance=
 a2 as a 
result.

Now I expect that only a certain attribute is different =
between a1 
and a2. I don't want to retest all the attributes. So I want to=
 test 
just the difference between a1 and a2 object graph.

DiffResult dr =
=3D diff(a1, a2);

asse=
rtEquals(1, diffAtrib.size());

ffAttrib[0]);
